title: Bara brith sheep biscuits
description: Bara brith is a traditional Welsh cake laced with gentle spices and dried fruit. The flavours are lovely in these cute biscuits - quite similar to Shrewsbury biscuits.Equipment: for this recipe you will need a pestle and mortar and a sheep-shaped biscuit cutter.
ingredients: ½ lemon, finely grated zest only
500g/1lb 2oz self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
metallic light silver food colour paste
